title.narrative: 13.2 PLANNING AND MONITORING CAPACITY

description.narrative: 13.2 Relevant ministries/ institutions have enhanced capacity to monitor the situation of women and children and to influence policy/legislation and targeting of response in national plans, which contributes to Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 13 Cross Sectoral Management Support

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF INTERIOR LOCAL GOVERNMENT AND RECONCILIATION SOUTHWEST STATE OF SOMALIA

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF Somalia Support Centre (USSC) P.O. Box 44145 - 00100 Nairobi

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 13.2 Relevant ministries/ institutions have enhanced capacity to monitor the situation of women and children and to influencepolicy/legislation and targeting of response in national plans
of sector studies completed, validated with government/stakeholders and pilots initiated for assigned functions within targeted Ministries
Number of Joint (multi-sectoral, multi-partner) Monitoring Missions (situation and/or performance) conducted in hard to reach/most vulnerable locations, out of total joint missions conducted

baseline.value: 2 of 2 in NEZ only for 2010. Only UNICEF multi sectoral but not multi-partner missions for NWZ/CSZ

title.narrative: Existence of National Plan/s of Action for Children under endorsed/ratified CRC which indicate priority areas and associated resources

baseline.value: Intention to endorse in Somaliland and Puntland. TFG intention to ratify

title.narrative: Existence of a functional inter-ministerial body convened by Ministry of Planning that addresses issues of convergence and linking district plans to national plans

baseline.value: Limited programme convergence in UNICEF and government institutions/line ministries.Only one inter-ministerial programme convergence meeting conducted in Puntland

title.narrative: Existence of a functioning inter-ministerial body mandated to advocate and leverage resources for CRC and CEDAW

baseline.value: MOWDAFA advocates on CRC in PL, while the Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs in SL is considering setting up a Children's Department

title.narrative: Existence of Disaster Risk Reduction policy, emergency and preparedness plans and institutional framework

baseline.value: No existing Disaster Risk Reduction (DRR) policy. Zonal EPRP available

title.narrative: SomInfo functional and in use in Ministries of Planning and relevant line Ministries by 2015

baseline.value: SomInfo software and office equipment furnished
